messages.subject: Conferences and Florida
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/26/03 8:13:39 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/26/03 8:13:39 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< One, I have heard Florida mentioned a few times for unschooling.
Where or what for that matter? I am in South Florida. I know there
is a conference this month for the Florida Association of parent
educators (I think thats their title??). I am not sure how unschooly
or not they are? >>

Not.
FPEA is hugely a conservatively run group, I don't agree with much of Brenda
Dickinsons push with the legislative decisions.
I'm sure their conference will be a major Christian affair. Not my cuppa.
There won't be anything mentioned about unschooling but there'll be loads of
curriculum offered.

Ren
"They dined on mince, and slices of quince, Which they ate with a runcible
spoon;
And hand in hand, on the edge of the sand, they danced by the light of the
moon."
--The Owl and the Pussycat
Edward Lear
